name: TBThemes Theme Import
author: thebootstrapthemes

sections.description:
Official Demo import plugin for BootstrapThemes themes.

Easily import your demo content, widgets, and theme settings with just one click.

Themes that are currently supported:

  • Relax Spa
  • Coach
  • Fitness
  • Travel Tour
  • Magazine Newspaper
  • Chic Lifestyle
  • Blog
sections.installation:
1. Upload tbthemes-demo-import folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress Dashboard
  3. Go to ‘Appereance’ -> (Theme Name) -> Select tab ‘Demo Import’
  4. Select Demo item to be imported.
